name: Pilkipedia Wiki
summary: Pilkipedia is the only online encyclopaedia dedicated to the work of Karl Pilkington, Stephen Merchant and Ricky Gervais. The site includes in-depth articles on their Xfm radio shows and The Ricky Gervais Show podcasts, as well as content on their TV shows, films and stand-up.

name: Pilkipedia Discord
summary: Pilkipedia discord server for discussing all things Ricky, Steve and Karl.

name: Rhondson Xfm Remasters
summary: Remaster of the original XFM shows hosted on the Pilky01 spotify channel.
content: See the #xfm-archive-project channel on the Pilkipedia discord.

name: A Very Pilkington Christmas (Game)
summary: This 2D pixel art adventure is chock-full of references and classic Pilky moments. In addition to the main story, there are also optional Bucket List tasks to be completed throughout the game. Completing all tasks will unlock special content that you wonâ€™t want to miss.

name: The K Man (freewebs)
summary: Original Karl Pilkington fan site, mentioned on the Xfm shows.

name: De Trout Spinners Podcast
summary: Podcast where the hosts retrospect an episode of the original Xfm broadcast each week.
content:
Join hosts Miles and Gary as they take a retrospective look through the Xfm RSK archive, breaking down each episode chronologically each week, in wistful, loving and (they hope - wrongly) humorous episodes.

Already being described as "the worst way to spend a long commute", the De Trout Spinners is a nostalgic dive into the hilarious, chaotic and oddly sweet world of the 2001-2005 Xfm Ricky Gervais Show.

 Note: The show is no longer active.

name: The Karly Pilkboys Podcast
summary: Podcast re-capping the original XFM shows partly from the perspective of a new listener.
content: Why are people still listening to The Ricky Gervais Show on XFM more than 20 years after it started? On the Karly Pilkboys we'll recap each episode of this show that was originally broadcast on a Saturday afternoon in London between 1 and 3pm. The hosts are two radio presenters, David and Zach. David has been listening to The Ricky Gervais Show repeatedly for a decade and Zach has never heard them. Join us as we celebrate this totally unique, bronze award winning radio show.

name: RSKXFM Remasters
summary: Remastered versions of the original Xfm shows.

name: Covchump
summary: Site streaming various Xfm shows and podcasts.

name: Michael Leighton's Karly Pilkboys
summary: Youtube channel with original animations of some of Karl's stories.
